017package org.apache.juneau.rest.client.remote;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteUtils.*;
020
021import java.lang.reflect.*;
022import java.util.*;
023import java.util.concurrent.*;
024
025import org.apache.juneau.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
030
031/**
032 * Represents the metadata about the returned object of a method on a remote proxy interface.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
035 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestProxyBasics">REST Proxy Basics</a>
036 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestClientBasics">juneau-rest-client Basics</a>
037 * </ul>
038 */
039public class RemoteOperationReturn {
040
041   private final Type returnType;
042   private final RemoteReturn returnValue;
043   private final ResponseBeanMeta meta;
044   private boolean isFuture, isCompletableFuture;
045
046   RemoteOperationReturn(MethodInfo m) {
047      ClassInfo rt = m.getReturnType();
048
049      AnnotationList al = m.getAnnotationList(REMOTE_OP_GROUP);
050      if (al.isEmpty())
051         al = m.getReturnType().unwrap(Value.class,Optional.class).getAnnotationList(REMOTE_OP_GROUP);
052
053      RemoteReturn rv = null;
054
055      if (rt.is(Future.class)) {
056         isFuture = true;
057         rt = ClassInfo.of(((ParameterizedType)rt.innerType()).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
058      } else if (rt.is(CompletableFuture.class)) {
059         isCompletableFuture = true;
060         rt = ClassInfo.of(((ParameterizedType)rt.innerType()).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
061      }
062
063      if (rt.is(void.class) || rt.is(Void.class)) {
064         rv = RemoteReturn.NONE;
065      } else {
066         Value<RemoteReturn> v = Value.of(RemoteReturn.BODY);
067         al.forEachValue(RemoteReturn.class, "returns", x -> true, x -> v.set(x));
068         rv = v.get();
069      }
070
071      if (rt.hasAnnotation(Response.class) && rt.isInterface()) {
072         this.meta = ResponseBeanMeta.create(m, AnnotationWorkList.create());
073         rv = RemoteReturn.BEAN;
074      } else {
075         this.meta = null;
076      }
077
078      this.returnType = rt.innerType();
079      this.returnValue = rv;
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Returns schema information about the HTTP part.
084    *
085    * @return Schema information about the HTTP part, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
086    */
087   public ResponseBeanMeta getResponseBeanMeta() {
088      return meta;
089   }
090
091   /**
092    * Returns the class type of the method return.
093    *
094    * @return The class type of the method return.
095    */
096   public Type getReturnType() {
097      return returnType;
098   }
099
100   /**
101    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link Future}.
102    *
103    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link Future}.
104    */
105   public boolean isFuture() {
106      return isFuture;
107   }
108
109   /**
110    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link CompletableFuture}.
111    *
112    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the return is wrapped in a {@link CompletableFuture}.
113    */
114   public boolean isCompletableFuture() {
115      return isCompletableFuture;
116   }
117
118   /**
119    * Specifies whether the return value is the body of the request or the HTTP status.
120    *
121    * @return The type of value returned.
122    */
123   public RemoteReturn getReturnValue() {
124      return returnValue;
125   }
126}
